name: Out Before Midnight
description:
Out Before Midnight is a first person horror-adventure that puts you in the shoes of James Crowder a reporter of the Paranormal Press. You're Co-worker has gone missing on an assignment at an old Victorian manor. Document your experience and gather evidence by taking pictures and exploring the manor. Watch out for the owner of the estate, THE DUKE!  

Follow us on twitter! @LockjawGames
